name: Wizards and Warriors Demo
description:
Wizards and Warriors is a 2d RPG game that I am working on. It will have quests, NPC's, boss fights and more. 

The NPC dialogue system isn't that far along in development yet so not much can happen in that department. A large number of features have a basic implementation but no way to actually gain weapons or craft or speak to NPC's for long.

One more thing. Unfortunately whenever I update this game, If you had a save it will be wiped. I am working on a workaround for this problem. You will possibly have to download a text file of your save. This may, unfortunately, make it very easy to cheat in this game. However, I am adding a cheats menu so I think it will be fine.
